Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend "Red" as a potential recommendation.
RED is a 2010 American action crime film directed by Martin Rappaport. The film stars Bruce Willis, Halle Berry, Chris Hemsworth, Ian McKellen, Cuba Gooding Jr., and Jessica Chastain.
RED tells the story of Frank (Willis), an aging hitman who has retired from his work after being shot by a young assassin named Nick (Hemsworth).
Frank is given 48 hours to find out why Nick killed his father. Frank tracks down Nick's home in the small town of Biggsburg, and discovers that Nick is actually an alien who has been sent to Earth to gather information.
Frank tracks Nick to his ship in the ocean outside Biggsburg. Frank manages to board Nick's ship and confronts Nick face-to-face.
Frank and Nick engage in a high-speed chase around Nick's ship, as well as through space by flying on Nick's spaceship.
Eventually, Frank manages to outmaneuver Nick and gain the upper hand over him.
Frank manages to get Nick into a compromising situation where he is forced to make a choice between his loyalty to his fellow aliens and his desire to continue living among humans at great personal risk.
Frank manages to convince Nick to choose his loyalty to his fellow aliens, rather than his desire to continue living among humans at great personal risk.
Nick ultimately decides to prioritize his loyalty to his fellow aliens over his desire to continue living among humans at great personal risk.
Eventually, Frank and Nick are able to successfully complete their mission and return safely to their respective homes on Earth.
In the end, both Frank and Nick are able to successfully complete their mission and return safely to their respective homes on Earth.
